metadata.title: CVE-2019-19637 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libsixel 1.8.2. There is an integer overflow inthe function sixel_decode_raw_impl at fromsixel.c.

criterions.comment: libsixel: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
